document_data.mainbody:
Loman was an employee of the Gallaway Trade Depot in Targos under the supervision of Deirdre Gallaway, or "Deird," as he called her, in the early 14 century DR.
Loman was a brown-haired timid human man.
Loman worse simple leather armor, and carried a dagger as well as a wooden club.
Loman worked at the Gallaway Trading Coasters shop on top of the cliff overlooking the docks in Targos, moving crates and organizing the depots inventory. He remained in Deirdre Gallaways employ through the Legion of the Chimera crisis of the .
